sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns>bf5a30cf2f43e010e0f497eef699b6b8,3bb146ac2fa8a490e0f497eef699b653,b1902e8f2fefb810e0f497eef699b6d0</campaigns> <description>(Maneuver) Player may suffer a number of strain up to their ranks in Martial Arts. For the remainder of the encounter, the player adds 1 melee defense per strain suffered. After this talent is used, if the player is attacked with a Brawl, Melee, or Lightsaber attack that generates 3 threat or 1 despair, the player may spend that to immediately perform a Brawl attack against the attacker. For the remainder of the encounter, the player adds 1 boost die per strain suffered to all Brawl checks.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Martial Arts</name> <number>TAL0001303</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>ben.fisher</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-01-24 04:54:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0d2367a02f1d8550e0f497eef699b6a3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-01-26 18:16:56</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
